Job Title: RF Machine Operator

Location: Anderson, SC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Justrite Safety Group is a growing family of industrial safety companies. Together we protect workers, workplaces and the environment with a comprehensive range of industrial safety solutions. All Justrite Safety Group portfolio companies are united by deep safety knowledge, long experience, and a commitment to protecting people, property, and the planet.

Basic Concepts, Inc, is the world leader in portable spill containment systems. In Anderson, SC, we are seeking an RF Machine Operator. An RF Machine Operator is an individual with great hand dexterity, machine operator experience, and an eye for quality and attention to detail. Work with little supervision while following all health and safety standards is essential. The goal is to contribute to the construction of secondary spill containment berms.

Principal Duties And Responsibilities

To accurately read and understand written work order instructions and take accurate measurements to ensure quality. Use hand tools required to perform the job. These include but not limited to; hammers, tape measures, utility knives, and scissors. Work with materials such as vinyl, foam, aluminum and steel. Measure, cut and seam vinyl panels. Ability to move oversized pieces of materials onto and off of rolling carts (with assistance of others). Using forms, place vinyl panels into molds for the RF Machine to mechanically seam the panel to the material using a specific pattern per the work order. Ability to meet production requirements in a given time span. Complete inspections and conduct rework if needed. 

Knowledge, Skills And Abilities Required

Have a great attitude and willing to grow with the company Diligently follow safe work practices for yourself and team members at all times Must be able to work in a flexible team environment with job rotation as needed Must be able to work overtime as needed Ability to follow verbal and written instructions with minimal supervision Knowledge of measurements using a tape measure. 

Working Conditions 

Able to lift and carry 50 lbs to waist and over head Ability to bend, twist, stand and walk up to 9 hours per day. Wear all required PPE including: knee pads, cut resistant gloves, hearing protection (as required) and safety glasses (as required) Good physical condition and endurance. Ability to work in high heat conditions. 

The above declarations are not intended to be an all-inclusive list of the duties and responsibilities of the job described, nor are they intended to be such a listing of the skills and abilities required to do the job. Rather, they are intended only to describe the general nature of the job.

Benefits

We offer excellent comprehensive benefits that include:

Medical, Dental & Vision benefits Health Care Savings Accounts and Flexible Spending Accounts Paid time off including vacation & personal time  401K – with company match.  Both pretax and Roth options available Company paid Short Term Disability Company paid Long Term Disability Company paid Employee Assistance Program Employee Wellness Program Monthly 10% hourly bonus

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
